title: Artificial Sweeteners: Do They Really Control Blood Sugar Levels?

title: How Bad Can Just 1 Teaspoon of Sugar in Your Daily Cuppa Be?
description: "One of the creepiest, emptiest and utterly unhealthiest ways for calories to sneak in - sugar!", said Nutritionist Dr Pooja Makhija

title: Bournvita and Sugar: Are Health Powder Drinks Making Your Child Prone to Diabetes?
description: All natural foods contain some form of sugar, be it fruits, vegetables, cereals and milk. These naturally-occurring sugars are enough to take care of our body needs and free sugars, such as processed and brown sugar, and added sugar can only overload your system, say paediatric endocrinologists.
